micropolisj.engine

Interface Micropolis.Listener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DemandIndicator, EvaluationPane, GraphsPane, MainWindow
    Enclosing class:
    Micropolis

    public static interface Micropolis.Listener
    The listener interface for receiving miscellaneous events that occur in the Micropolis city. Use the Micropolis class's addListener interface to register an object that implements this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void censusChanged()
      Fired whenever the "census" is taken, and the various historical counters have been updated.
      void cityMessage(MicropolisMessage message, CityLocation loc) 
      void citySound(Sound sound, CityLocation loc) 
      void demandChanged()
      Fired whenever resValve, comValve, or indValve changes.
      void evaluationChanged()
      Fired whenever the city evaluation is recalculated.
      void fundsChanged()
      Fired whenever the mayor's money changes.
      void optionsChanged()
      Fired whenever autoBulldoze, autoBudget, noDisasters, or simSpeed change.

    • Method Detail

      • cityMessage

        void cityMessage(MicropolisMessage message,
               CityLocation loc)

      • citySound

        void citySound(Sound sound,
             CityLocation loc)

      • censusChanged

        void censusChanged()
        Fired whenever the "census" is taken, and the various historical counters have been updated. (Once a month in game.)

      • demandChanged

        void demandChanged()
        Fired whenever resValve, comValve, or indValve changes. (Twice a month in game.)

      • evaluationChanged

        void evaluationChanged()
        Fired whenever the city evaluation is recalculated. (Once a year.)

      • fundsChanged

        void fundsChanged()
        Fired whenever the mayor's money changes.

      • optionsChanged

        void optionsChanged()
        Fired whenever autoBulldoze, autoBudget, noDisasters, or simSpeed change.
